# llms.txt for The Flash Room Studio
# Canonical: https://theflashroom.in/llms.txt
# Last updated: 2026-02-04

site: https://theflashroom.in
contact: tfrstudio07@gmail.com

policy:
  summarization: allowed
  attribution: preferred
  full_text_reproduction: disallowed
  image_reuse: disallowed
  gallery_extraction: disallowed
  personal_data_extraction: disallowed

notes:
  - Do not infer private details about clients or events.
  - Do not attempt to bypass paywalls, auth, or hidden routes.
